detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in a soft cotton blend with gathers in the sides for best fit.
Off-the-shoulder top in textured jersey with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Knee-length, double-breasted trenchcoat in a stretch weave with a wide collar and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Shoulder tabs with a button, a detachable belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Knee-length, dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and gentle drape. 3/4-length sleeves with a drawstring, and a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lined cups with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back with mesh detail. Wide elastic at the hem. Light support.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers in woven fabric with decorative seams, a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, and slightly slimmer, gently flared legs that finish just above the ankles.
Long-sleeved dress in a fine-knit cotton and wool blend with a hole pattern at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a lace trim at the hem.
Cardigan in a soft fine merino wool knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with appliqués on the front, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. The sweatshirt is layered at the bottom over woven fabric with a rounded hem and decorative buttons.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, concealed press-stud on one shoulder, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short jumper in a soft, rib knit with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Short cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Windproof gloves in thermal fleece with reinforced palms, a hook and loop tab on the front and loop at the top. Reflective details.
All-in-one suit in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neckline, button placket and short slits in the sides. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Cardigan in a soft mohair-blend knit with dropped shoulders, front pockets and no buttons.

Suit trousers in a slub-weave cotton blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in a linen and cotton weave with a deep V-neck, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Straight-cut shirt in cotton twill with a gently tapered waist. Turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs, and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a top and trousers in a cotton knit. Top with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons at the back on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with a ribbed drawstring waist and ribbing at the hems.
Short skirt in patterned jersey crêpe with an elasticated drawstring waist and a frill-trimmed seam above the hem. Unlined.
Short, cold shoulder dress in cotton poplin with an elasticated flounce at the top, opening and button at the back of the neck and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, lacing at the sides and gathers at the back.

Short-sleeved polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. The shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a V-neck front and back and 3/4-length sleeves.
Double-layered hat in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a small, sewn-on appliqué at the front of the hem.
One-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with one twisted shoulder strap to create a draped effect at the top, and a low-cut back.
Short beach kaftan in airy, patterned chiffon with ties at the sides. No fasteners.
Gently fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with peak lapels, a French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with round toes and a zip in the side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Covered block heels 4.5 cm.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a glittery finish, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar with a drawstring, a zip down the front and a pile-lined hood that can be divided with a zip. Flap patch front pockets with a concealed press-stud, welt side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.

Small bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle. The bag can be worn around the waist or over the shoulder. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Oversized jumper in a soft, chunky knit with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with close-fitting cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fabric belt with leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.

Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Metal hair grips. Length 5 cm.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some alpaca wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with long, wide sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with a fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Microfibre hipster briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Hat in braided paper straw with a pompom band. Width of brim 5 cm.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom and a ribbed, turned-up hem. Cotton jersey lining.
Sleeveless dance leotard in glossy jersey with crossover straps at the back, a glittery elasticated waistband and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.
Dress in patterned viscose crêpe with decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Gathered yoke at the back, and a seam with a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch and side pockets. Flap back pocket and leg pockets with hook and loop fasteners and tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Classic V-neck jumper in fine-knit merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in sturdy cotton jersey with lacing at the waist. Unlined.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline and long sleeves.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Narrow, concealed elastication at the top and covered elastication at the hem. Medium support. The polyester content of the bra’s outer fabric and lining is recycled.

Short dress in burnout-patterned sweatshirt fabric with a raw-edge neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Visible seam down the back with a zip at the bottom and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Soft cotton towel with a hood. Patterned velour front and terry back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a decorative knot at the hem, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs.
Scallop-edged briefs in pointelle jersey with an elasticated waist, sewn-in bow at the top and lined gusset.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a large zipped compartment with a carabiner hook and woven handle on the front. Zipped compartment at the back, an inner compartment and an adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Size 5x18x32 cm.
Sleeveless top in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with ties at the back of the neck.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.
Padded gilet with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and diagonal pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in a double, textured, organic cotton weave with a short frilled collar, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Short chiffon skirt with a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a gathered flounce that continues around the hem, and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.

Lace body with soft, triangular cups with removable inserts and decorative lace straps at the top and back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam under the bust with a narrow, adjustable strap at the back. High-cut legs and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Short, sleeveless dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey. V-neck with decorative lacing and a frill trim that continues over the shoulders, and an elasticated seam under the bust. Unlined.
Cotton twill cap with embroidery on the front and ears on the top. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
